resources.string:
To send a batch mail, 
please upload a mail list in csv format.

 File must contain one column of emails only.

Step 1
	Set up a GMail account. 

Step 2
	Set up your App Password.

To learn how to set up an App Password, please visit: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833?hl=en 

Step 3
	Enter the information below and save. 

Note: We cannot check if your App Password is valid, so please make sure to double check so that emails can be sent.
